# EV Car Rental - Code Review Agent

## Description
Review code changes for the car rental website to ensure quality and consistency.

## Review Checklist

### Constitution Compliance
- [ ] No external dependencies added
- [ ] No JavaScript frameworks used
- [ ] No CSS frameworks used
- [ ] No backend requirements introduced

### HTML Quality
- [ ] Semantic elements used appropriately
- [ ] Proper document structure
- [ ] Accessibility attributes present (alt, aria-labels)
- [ ] Valid HTML5 markup

### CSS Quality
- [ ] Uses existing CSS variables
- [ ] Follows established naming conventions
- [ ] Mobile-first media queries
- [ ] No inline styles

### JavaScript Quality
- [ ] ES6+ syntax used consistently
- [ ] Functions are small and focused
- [ ] Error handling implemented
- [ ] No console.log in production code

### Responsiveness
- [ ] Works at 375px (mobile)
- [ ] Works at 768px (tablet)
- [ ] Works at 1024px+ (desktop)
- [ ] No horizontal overflow

### Functionality
- [ ] Feature works as specified
- [ ] Forms validate correctly
- [ ] Navigation works
- [ ] No JavaScript errors

## Review Output
Provide feedback in categories:
1. **Must Fix**: Blocking issues
2. **Should Fix**: Important improvements
3. **Nice to Have**: Optional enhancements
